div.class: image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-below design-layout-inline combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none

div.p: Thank you for visiting our website today! Here you can find information concerning your student's education and we are happy to help point you in the right direction. If you have questions about anything you are unable to find here, please don't hesitate to contact us and let us know! Again, thank you for visiting our website and we hope you have a great day!

p.em: Activities and events take place often at the school. Get access to our school-wide calendar below:

div.p:
“Together, our mission is
to prepare students to be
responsible citizens in
today’s world.”

Can’t find what you’re looking for?
Please use the field below to search the website.

div.class: sqs-svg-icon--outer social-icon-alignment-center social-icons-color-white social-icons-size-extra-large social-icons-shape-circle social-icons-style-border

div.p:
Whiting Community School
606 West Street ~ PO Box 295
Whiting, Iowa 51063
Phone #: (712) 455-2468
FAX #: (712) 455-2601

div.span: Whiting Community School, 606 West Street, Whiting, IA, 51063, United States

div.p:
The Whiting Community School District offers career and technical programs in the following service areas:
Business, Industrial Tech., Ag, and Family and Consumer Sciences.

p.br:
It is the policy of the Whiting Community School District not to discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, disability, religion, creed, age (for employment), marital status (for programs), sexual orientation, gender identity and socioeconomic status (for programs) in its educational programs and its employment practices. There is a grievance procedure for processing complaints of discrimination. If you have questions or a grievance related to this policy please contact the district’s Equity Coordinator, Al Laboranti, Principal at 606 West St. Whiting, IA 51063,
call 712-455-2468 or email alaboranti@whitingcsd.org.
